features.title: Stand Up Pouch Features

image.alt: Stand up pouch with feature pointers for hang holes, zipper, and more

list: Self-standing bottom gusset for optimal shelf display
High-barrier materials to protect against moisture, oxygen & UV
Zipper closure for resealability and extended freshness
Windows, spouts, tear notches, and euro slots
features.description: Suitable for dry and liquid products, with eco-friendly and recyclable options.
